parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Object Detection </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns an array with all the units in the group or group of the unit.<br>
For a destroyed object an empty array is returned.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature_arma3</title><part><name index="1"/><value> Since 2.01.146926, type can also be [[Side]]. Command will then return all units of given side.</value></part></template>  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[units]] type </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> type: [[Group]] or [[Object]], <template><title>since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.01.146926</value></part></template> also [[Side]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[Object]]s </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>_myUnitCount = [[count]] [[units]] [[group]] [[player]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2 </name>=<value> <code>_isInMyGroup = _soldier1 [[in]] [[units]] [[player]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[group]], [[allGroups]], [[allUnits]], [[playableUnits]], [[switchableUnits]], [[vehicles]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on September 24, 2009
<dt class="note">[[User:Kronzky|Kronzky]]
<dd class="note">The returned array on MP clients is not updated when team members die (only when they are deleted). (''Tested on VBS2'')
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
